00008 namespace PWAS.DataAccess.SQLRepositories
00009 {
00010     public class OrderRepository : PWAS.DataAccess.Interfaces.IOrderRepository
00011     {
00012         private Table<Order> orderTable;
00013 
00014         public OrderRepository(string connectionString)
00015         {
00016             orderTable = new PWASDataContext(connectionString).Orders;
00017         }
00018 
00019         public void AddOrder(Order order)
00020         {
00021             orderTable.InsertOnSubmit(order);
00022         }
00023 
00024         public void SubmitChanges()
00025         {
00026             orderTable.Context.SubmitChanges();
00027         }
00028 
00029         public Order GetById(int orderId)
00030         {
00031             return orderTable.FirstOrDefault(o => o.orderID == orderId);
00032         }
00033 
00034         public void DeleteOrder(int orderId)
00035         {
00036             orderTable.DeleteOnSubmit(GetById(orderId));
00037         }
00038 
00039         public void UpdateOrderStatus(int orderId, int statusId)
00040         {
00041             Order o = GetById(orderId);
00042             Status newStatus = orderTable.Context.GetTable<Status>().Single(s => s.statusId == statusId);
00043             o.Status = newStatus;
00044             orderTable.Context.SubmitChanges();
00045         }
00046 
00047         public void UpdateOrderRunId(int orderId, int runId)
00048         {
00049             Order o = GetById(orderId);
00050             PrintRun pr = orderTable.Context.GetTable<PrintRun>().Single(s => s.runID == runId);
00051             o.PrintRun= pr;
00052             orderTable.Context.SubmitChanges();
00053         }
00054 
00055         public IQueryable<Order> Orders
00056         {
00057             get { return orderTable; }
00058         }
00059     }
